content.rendered:
Thanks for showing your interest in writing for us!

We at Wiser World cordially invite and encourage academics, journalists, researchers, activists, students to send comprehensive, well researched and in-depth submissions that will help shape a well-informed civil society. We endeavour to publish articles in a timely manner after they are reviewed, edited, and prepared for publication by our editorial team, while also handling our calendar and retaining a steady pace.

We prefer to publish articles that follow under certain areas, namely:

• Economy
• International Relations
• Defence & Security
• Foreign Policy
• Education
• Health
• Psychology
• Science and Technology
• Law
• Art and Culture
• Environment & Climate
• Gender
• Social Issues

Please submit your post as an attachment in the email at contact@wiserworld.in or as the Google document.

Publication Guidelines

Before you submit, go through our editorial guidelines:

NOTE: The author is solely responsible for the content written in their respective opinion pieces. The views and opinions expressed in the opinion pieces are those of the author and do not necessarily reflect the views of The Wiser World Team.
